coiler-5g-sa/SI-2/SI-2.py: cmm_update_record = "if [ `grep -E -i 'Debian' /etc/*-release | wc -l` != 0 ]; then date -d \"`grep 'upgrade'  /var/log/dpkg.log | tail -1 | awk '{print $1}'`\" +%s && date '+%s'; else if [ `grep -E -i 'Redhat' /etc/*-release | wc -l` != 0 ]; then date -d \"`grep 'updated'  /var/log/yum.log | tail -1 | awk '{print $1}'`\" +%s && date '+%s'; else echo 'Error'; fi fi"
